data.title: Zoning Atlas Amendment Conventional District MA24-0003 (Dimmocks Mill Road)
data.text:
Request:To amend the Upper Eno Critical Area Overlay boundary line. No amendments are proposed to the R-1 (Rural Residential) zoning district, Major Transportation Corridor Overlay District, or Future Land Use Map.

Planning Board Review and Recommendation: August 7, 2024 at 7:00 pm - Whitted Human Services Building, Donna S. Baker Meeting Room at 300 W. Tryon Street, Hillsborough. Planning Board recommended approval of the request.

Board of County Commissioners: September 5, 2024 at 7:00 pm - Whitted Human Services Building, Donna S. Baker Meeting Room at 300 W. Tryon Street, Hillsborough.
